entry.title: Specialized Tool Widget
entry.summary: The Specialized Tool Widget is responsible for tracking and displaying your primary and secondary equipped specialized tools cooldown and timers. They also visually indicate which mantle or booster it is currently tracking by their icons and color. This Widget is only available for Monster Hunter: World.
